attributes.action: Limit Mayoral positions to a maximum of two continuous terms
attributes.additional_details: We believe limiting Mayoral positions to a maximum of two terms prevents a candidate from becoming encumbered. Nothing would prevent a candidate from seeking re-election again in the future but this would require that they must step down after a second term.
attributes.background: Bring forward a Bill to limit all Mayoral positions to a maximum of two continuous terms.
